experiences.title: Science Research Specialist I
experiences.company: National Fisheries Research and Development Institute
experiences.location: Brackishwater Fisheries Research and Development Center
experiences.description: Working as a Science Research Specialist at the National Fisheries Research and Development Institute focusing on brackishwater fisheries research.
achievements: Contributing to fisheries research and development initiatives
Implementing research methodologies in brackishwater ecosystems
Analyzing data and preparing research reports
Collaborating with research teams on fisheries studies

experiences.title: Treasurer
experiences.description: Served as Treasurer for the UP Fisheries Guild, managing finances and contributing to organization activities.
achievements: Managed financial resources and budgeting for the organization
Co-keeper of the Nautilus at the University of the Philippines Fisheries Guild
Participated in organizational planning and events
Ensured proper financial record-keeping and reporting

experiences.title: Communications and Programs Intern
experiences.description: Participated in the Team KIKO Internship Program, focusing on communications and program implementation.
achievements: Assisted in developing communication materials and strategies
Supported program implementation and coordination
Engaged in community outreach activities
Gained experience in communications and program management

experiences.title: Bachelor of Science in Fisheries
experiences.description: Earned a Bachelor of Science in Fisheries degree with Cum Laude honors, focusing on fisheries science and research methodologies.
achievements: Graduated Cum Laude (2023)
Conducted research on fisheries and aquatic resources
Active member of the UP Fisheries Guild (2021-2023)
Developed expertise in fisheries management and research

experiences.title: Senior High School
experiences.description: Completed Senior High School education with High Honors, establishing a strong academic foundation.
achievements: Graduated with High Honors (2019)
Participated in academic competitions and extracurricular activities
Developed interest in science and research
Active in student organizations

experiences.title: Elementary Education
experiences.description: Completed primary education with Salutatorian honors, demonstrating early academic excellence.
achievements: Graduated as Salutatorian (2013)
Participated in school competitions and activities
Received recognition for academic excellence
Developed foundation for continued educational success

projects.title: Giant Freshwater Prawn Polyculture
projects.description: Technical training on giant freshwater prawn polyculture techniques, focusing on sustainable aquaculture practices.

projects.title: Marine Species Status Assessment
projects.description: Research on high-value marine species, analyzing status and development trends in sustainable aquaculture practices.

projects.title: Biodiversity Assessment of Iloilo Beach
projects.description: Conducted biodiversity assessment of Iloilo Beach to document and analyze marine ecosystems and species diversity.

certifications.title: RA 1080 (BOARD) - Fisheries Professional
certifications.description: Passed the Fisheries Professional licensure examination with a rating of 75%

certifications.title: ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System
